entry.title: Ordinals BIP PR
entry.summary: The email received discusses the topic of Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs). It mentions that BIPs such as increasing the block size, drive-chains, and colored coins were proposals aimed at improving Bitcoin. However, the sender expresses their disagreement with the recipient's BIP, stating that it brings no improvement and is actually a regression. The recipient is urged to retract the proposal or, if they still wish to negatively affect the chain, to create Outcomes Improvement Proposals (OIPs) or similar alternatives. The sender emphasizes the importance of focusing on the development of Bitcoin and real BIPs that improve the cryptocurrency.
